documents.title: spondon traveller eviction almost complete
text: a police operation to evict a group of travellers who have been parked on a park in spondon since earlier this week is almost complete .

derbyshire police said the group , which had been served with an eviction notice by the city council , have mostly left but officers were staying at the site to make sure the last few vehicles leave .
insp lauren woods , who leads policing in the area , said : the city council served the eviction notice , which is the proper course of action when travellers arrive on public land .
however we noticed that there was an increase in the waste being left by the group and so we decided quickly to use section 61 .
this is available to us in certain circumstances and on this occasion , waste being strewn across the fields meant we could evict them using these powers . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: would-be robber handed gun threat note to cashier
text: a would-be bank robber who passed a note to a cashier threatening to `` start shooting '' unless she handed over cash has been jailed .
danny powell , of no fixed address , queued up in the lloyds branch in market street , eckington , before handing over the folded piece of paper , derbyshire police said .
the hand-written note said he had a gun and would start shooting unless he was given `` all the cash '' .
however , no firearm was seen and he left the branch empty-handed a short time later , leaving his note behind .
derbyshire police said the botched raid took place on 27 march - two days before he used the same trick at a bank in kent and left with some money .
he was arrested in june by kent police and was last week at canterbury crown court he was jailed for four-and-a-half years after pleading guilty to robbery and attempted robbery .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

text: a hollywood actress has up an honorary degree from the university of nottingham .
ruth wilson , who won a golden globe in 2014 for her role in us tv series , the affair , and starred in the bbc 's luther , already has a degree in history from the university , graduating in 2003 .

so thank you university of nottingham and the new theatre , because without this experience here for those three years , i probably would n't have gone into acting itself , '' she said .

documents.title: derby rapist handed extra punishment after failed appeal
text: a rapist serving a life sentence for attacking six women in one night has failed in a bid to clear his name .
harbinder singh khatkar was jailed for a minimum term of 14 years in 2013 after he attacked three women in the street in derby and broke into the homes of three others .
he tried to challenge his convictions at the court of appeal , in london , making a series of allegations against the judge at his trial , the police and even his own lawyers .
but his case was rejected as being `` totally without merit '' by three of the country 's top judges .
lord justice irwin , sitting with sir wyn williams and judge mark brown , said the appeal bid `` should never have been made '' .
and , as a punishment for wasting judicial time , the court took the rare step of ordering khatkar to serve an extra month behind bars before he can seek parole .
author: Gavin Bevis

documents.title: beckett : cancelling midland mainline electrification 'a big mistake '
text: derby south mp margaret beckett says the government has made a `` big mistake '' in scrapping the electrification of the midland mainline .
the department for transport announced yesterday new bi-mode trains would be able to run on both electric and non-electric sections of track so the upgrade was no longer necessary .

labour mp beckett said : `` there 's been talk about the midlands engine and all of this policy stuff about the opportunities available to the country and midland mainline electrification was absolutely part of it .
`` right across local government , local businesses and so on , people are really really fed up .
`` this is a big disappointment and , i fear , quite a big mistake . ''

transport secretary chris grayling said yesterday : `` passengers will benefit sooner and experience less disruption compared with putting up intrusive wires and masts along routes where they are no longer required . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

text: the bbc understands a block housing students from leicester and de montfort universities has cladding similar in material to that on grenfell tower .

the material is aluminium composite material ( acm ) , a similar type but not exactly the same cladding that was on the grenfell tower .

documents.title: belgrave gate transformation planned by city council
text: the road along a stretch of belgrave gate in leicester will be narrowed to make way for cycle lanes , under new plans announced by the city council .
the authority wants to spend £ 1.9m transforming a stretch between the haymarket bus station and belgrave circle .
the proposals would see a new off-road cycle lane installed on both sides of belgrave gate with footpaths upgraded and the road resurfaced .
a new shared footpath and cycleway would be created beneath the flyover at burleys way if government funding is secured to make the plans happen .
city mayor peter soulsby said the changes would `` help create much more attractive route from the city centre out to the abbey park and the golden mile '' .

documents.title: opposition to farm for 220,000 chickens
text: over 8,000 people are objecting to plans for a new poultry farm in nottinghamshire .
the site , near cropwell bishop , would house 220,000 chickens , include four buildings for the chickens and a dead bird shed .
the proposed four buildings will be in the field to the left of those green topped round discs you can see in the above .
the farm will create three full-time jobs , according to the application to rushcliffe borough council .
residents told me they 're concerned about the smell and the conditions the birds will be kept in .
the applicant , who is part of the samworth farmers group , owns the whole site and there 's already an arable farm there .
we 've approached them for a comment but they have n't responded .
